channel.title: Dashboard on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Dashboard on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: Copilot usage metrics dashboard and API in public preview
item.description:
GitHub announced that a Copilot usage metrics dashboard and a corresponding API are available in public preview for GitHub Enterprise, allowing organizations to view and programmatically access Copilot usage metrics.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Premium requests analytics page is now generally available
item.description:
GitHub launched a new Premium Requests analytics dashboard (generally available Sept 29, 2025) that offers comprehensive insights into premium request activity with data back to August 1, 2025.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: dotnet: Announcing Aspire 9.5
item.description:
Aspire 9.5 introduces a preview ‘aspire update’ command, single-file AppHost support, improved CLI and dashboard UX, and new integrations for AI, DevTunnels, and other tooling.

  • Source: .NET
